jade.core
Class World

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.Messenger
      jade.core.World

public abstract class World
extends Messenger

A level in which Jade Actors interact.

Constructor Summary
World(int width, int height)
          Constructs an empty World with the given dimensions.

Method Detail

addActor

public final void addActor(Actor actor)
Adds an Actor to the World at a random open tile, as generated by the global instance of Dice with a call to getOpenTile.

Parameters:
actor - the Actor to be added

addActor

public final void addActor(Actor actor,
                           Coord coord)
Adds an Actor to the World at (x, y), as given by the Coord

Parameters:
actor - the Actor to be added
coord - the location of the actor

addActor

public final void addActor(Actor actor,
                           Dice dice)
Adds an Actor to the World at a random open tile, as generated by the specified Dice with a call to getOpenTile.

Parameters:
actor - the Actor to be added
dice - the random number generator used to find the open tile

addActor

public void addActor(Actor actor,
                     int x,
                     int y)
Adds an Actor to the World at (x, y).

Parameters:
actor - the Actor to be added
x - the x value of the location of the actor
y - the y value of the location of the actor

getActor

public <T extends Actor> T getActor(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
Returns an arbitrary actor of type T that is currently bound to the World, or null if there is none. Note that the return type is T and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the return type, which must extend Actor
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
Returns:
an actor of type T that is bound to the World

getActorAt

public final <T extends Actor> T getActorAt(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                            Coord coord)
Returns an arbitrary Actor of type T which occupies the tile at (x, y), or returns null if there is none, where (x, y) is determined by coord. Note that the return type is T and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the return type
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
coord - the value of the location being queried
Returns:
an arbitrary Actor of type t which occupies (x, y)

getActorAt

                                      int x,
                                      int y)
Returns an arbitrary Actor of type T which occupies the tile at (x, y), or returns null if there is none. Note that the return type is T and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the return type
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
x - the x value of the location being queried
y - the y value of the location being queried
Returns:
an arbitrary Actor of type t which occupies (x, y)

getActors

public <T extends Actor> java.util.Set<T> getActors(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
Returns all instances of Actor of type T that are currently bound to this World. Note that the return type is based on T, and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the type that filters the instances of Actor
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
Returns:
the set of all Actors of type T

getActorsAt

public final <T extends Actor> java.util.Set<T> getActorsAt(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                                            Coord coord)
Returns all instances of Actor of type T occupying the tile at (x, y), which is determined by the given Coord. Note that the return type is based on T, and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the type that filters each instance of Actor
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
coord - the value of the location being queried
Returns:
all instances of actor of type T at (x, y)

getActorsAt

public <T extends Actor> java.util.Set<T> getActorsAt(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                                      int x,
                                                      int y)
Returns all instances of Actor of type T occupying the tile at (x, y). Note that the return type is based on T, and is determined by cls.

Type Parameters:
T - the type that filters each instance of Actor
Parameters:
cls - the Class that determines T
x - the x value of the location being queried
y - the y value of the location being queried
Returns:
all instances of actor of type T at (x, y)

getOpenTile

public final Coord getOpenTile()
Returns the location of a randomly choosen open tile. The global instance of Dice is used for random number generation. A tile is considered open if it is passable and there is not Actor occupant.

Returns:
the location of a randomly choosen open tile

getOpenTile

public final Coord getOpenTile(Dice dice)
Returns the location of a randomly choosen open tile using the given instance of Dice is used for random number generation. A tile is considered open if it is passable and there is not Actor occupant.

Parameters:
dice - the instance of Dice used for random number generation
Returns:
the location of a randomly choosen open tile

getOpenTile

public Coord getOpenTile(Dice dice,
                         int x1,
                         int y1,
                         int x2,
                         int y2)
Returns a randomly choosen open tile within the given rectangle bounds using the given instance of Dice for random number generation. A tile is considered open if it is passable and there is not Actor occupant.

Parameters:
dice - the instance of Dice used for random number generation
x1 - the minimum x value of the tile
y1 - the minumum y value of the tile
x2 - the maximum x value of the tile
y2 - the maximum y value of the tile
Returns:
a randomly choosen open tile

getOpenTile

public final Coord getOpenTile(int x1,
                               int y1,
                               int x2,
                               int y2)
Returns a randomly choosen open tile within the given rectangle bounds. A tile is considered open if it is passable and there is not Actor occupant.

Parameters:
x1 - the minimum x value of the tile
y1 - the minumum y value of the tile
x2 - the maximum x value of the tile
y2 - the maximum y value of the tile
Returns:
a randomly choosen open tile

                              int y)

lookAll

public final java.util.List<ColoredChar> lookAll(Coord coord)
Returns every tile that is visible at a given location, ordered such that the tile with least prioirty is first, and the most important (the tile returned by look), is last.

Parameters:
coord - the location being queried
Returns:
every tile that is visible at a given location

lookAll

public java.util.List<ColoredChar> lookAll(int x,
                                           int y)
Returns every tile that is visible at a given location, ordered such that the tile with least prioirty is first, and the most important (the tile returned by look), is last.

Parameters:
x - the x value of the location being queried
y - the y value of the location being queried
Returns:
every tile that is visible at a given location

passable

public final boolean passable(Coord pos)
Returns true if the tile at (x, y), as specified by the given Coord, is passable.

Parameters:
pos - the location being queried
Returns:
true if the tile at (x, y) is passable

passable

                        int y)

Returns:

removeActor

public void removeActor(Actor actor)
Removes an Actor from the World. The method raises an error if the Actor is not bound to this World.

Parameters:
actor - the Actor to be removed

removeExpired

public final void removeExpired()
Removes all actors which have been marked as expired.

setTile

public final void setTile(Coord pos,
                          ColoredChar face,
                          boolean passable)
Sets the face and passable value of the tile at (x, y), as given by the Coord

Parameters:
pos - the position of the location being queried
face - the new face of the tile
passable - new the passable value of the tile

setTile

public void setTile(int x,
                    int y,
                    ColoredChar face,
                    boolean passable)
Sets the face and passable value of the tile at (x, y)

Parameters:
x - the x value of the location being queried
y - the y value of the location being queried
face - the new face of the tile
passable - new the passable value of the tile

tick

public abstract void tick()
Defines the events of one game world tick. Normally this method calls act for certain classes of Actor, and then calls removedExpired to clean up.
